name: UltimateLib
author: Francesco Abbattista and Chad Keating
description:
The core library of the UltimateSuite, a set of tools to make development of mods an easy task. 
You will need this library if other mods depends on it. 

For more information, please visit our official forum page[forum.greenheartgames.com] 

You might also want to take a look at the Official UltimateLib API documentation[gdt-ultimatesuite.abesco.de] 

By downloading, installing and using the Software you also agree to comply with the Greenheart Games Modding Agreement[www.greenheartgames.com]. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Also featuring the UltimateModEditor. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Create mods easily without coding knowdledge with our Windows compatible editor. Read more by visiting our official forum page[forum.greenheartgames.com]. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

UltimateLib Version 1.4.0 
UltimateModEditor Version 0.4.5 

Written and developed by 
Francesco Abbattista (alphabit) 
Chad Keating (Sir Everard)
